title: Imran Khan's Final Episode - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.12.21
description:
Go to http://amazon.com/GAMESRX to save on prescription medication and get FREE 2-day delivery!

Download the DoorDash app in the App Store and use code GAMES2021 or GAMESCA (if you’re in Canada) to get 25% off and free delivery on your first order!

Come say goodbye to the former Informer Imran Khan.

00:00:00 - Start
00:13:55 - Housekeeping
Saturday is a huge day for Kinda Funny
Saturday is Wild Aces Game Day -- the Fan Controlled Football season starts with the Wild Aces squaring off against Quavo and Richard Sherman’s Glacier Boyz. We’ll be streaming the game at 5 p.m. PT on Saturday.
AFTER the game, stick around for Love, Sex, and Stuff’s live Valentine’s Day Call-in show.
PLUS Jim Lee is drawing on my PS5 DURING LSS, so flip between us and twitch.tv/jimlee!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: GrahamOfLegend, David Meintel, Trent Berrie, Black Jack, Luiz Aguiar (@8bitLuiz), James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), &The Nano Biologist
The Roper Report   -
00:15:25 - Six Days in Fallujah Dev Says US Gov not involved, Eddie @ GameSpot
00:28:35 - Halo Dump!
00:46:35 - Destiny 2’s Cosmodrome Ain’t Getting Bigger, Ethan Gach
00:50:00 - Hackers claim to have sold Cyberpunk 2077, Witcher 3 source code, James Batchelor @ GI.biz
00:55:20 - Out today
00:56:50 - Squad Up: Imran
01:01:15 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday: Blessing and Hopefully Fran?
Tuesday: Greg and Gary Whitta
Wednesday: Blessing and Andy
Thursday: Greg and Tim
Friday: Greg and Julia Hardy
